name: Extreme Race - Traffic Panic
description:
This is a free race game for all the racing lovers where you have to drive your ambulance on the highway and avoid the traffic on the way.
The game is very easy to play as you just tap on the screen to make the ambulance turn left or right in order to avoid the crash with big vehicles but at the same time try to crash the smaller once to gain points witch you can use to upgrade your ambulance.
The game comes with three different levels (dessert, snow and jungle environments ) from witch you can choose from.


Features:

- Easy to use for everyone with simple game controls
- 3 different levels
- Different ambulance models

Download it today for free and start driving the crazy highways and become the racing master! Enjoy!
